attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government, and in particular this Prime Minister, has compleately lost the confidence of the nation. This lack of leadership and professionalism is causing untold dammage throught the country, society and the economy. We are the laughing stock of the world. We the tax payers will eventually need to pay for this unprecedented incompetance. Time for a change, we didn't vote for Brown.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
